'''''Under the Tonatiuh's Wings''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to solve both puzzles on the stone rings East of the [[Cradle of Fleeting Dreams]] in [[Ochkanatlan]].
